import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List next-step mappings"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/workflows/steps/{workflowStepId}/nextsteps"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the allowed next-step transition mappings for a workflow step. These mappings define which status transitions are valid from the current step.

**Note**: This endpoint is part of API version 1.0 which is marked as deprecated.

**Authentication**: Requires authenticated user.

**Use Case**: Determine valid status transitions when updating a ticket.

**Workflow Example**:
1. Get ticket: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) â†’ extract `WorkflowStep.WorkflowStepId`.
2. Get allowed transitions: [GET /api/v1.0/workflows/steps/\{workflowStepId\}/nextsteps](/docs/api/workflows/get-workflow-next-steps).
3. Use `AllowedNextWorkflowStepId` values when changing ticket status.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"workflowStepId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the workflow step whose next-step mappings should be listed.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"eeeeeeee-ffff-0000-1111-222222222222"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
